Movie.Description: On Anand Dighe's death anniversary, a journalist sets off to cover the event honouring him. Soon, her interactions reveal the impact of the leader who managed to win the hearts of Thane residents.
Dr Smita and her senior, Dr Khurana, become rivals when she opposes a decision made by him during an operation. When he uses his influence to dismiss her, she gets an inquiry set up against him.

When a tragedy strikes the ambitious Makarand right before the completion of his dream directorial project, he seeks 31 days to stand on his own feet again and finish the remaining work. With the encouraging family and immense willpower, would he be able to complete his first feature or would he drop in the pit of failure?
Ankit and Devika, his girlfriend, plan to murder Avani, the former's wife, by feigning a double suicide. However, his plans are foiled when her corpse disappears.
Tukaram, a kind man, grows up in a family of ardent Vitthal devotees. However, when a famine strikes his village and ravages his clan, he realises the power of faith and turns into a saint.
Despite being together for a while, Mithun and Kanchi don't seem to be serious about their relationship. Will the two ever find love and commitment?
Romance unexpectedly develops between a mechanic and a young woman from a wealthy family.
A film about social norms, generation gaps, second chances and the tough choices that parents make for their children and sometimes when children have to do the same.
Balwant Patil, a billionaire, is the owner of a famous palace in Pune. Chaos and hilarity ensue as a variety of people try to claim his property.
Anurag, a married man, reminisces about his first love, Tanvi, after he learns that she is back in town. Later, the two friends meet and resolve old issues and promise to remain friends forever.
Gotya, a young boy who obsesses over marbles, strives hard to take the game to a national level and faces several challenges along the way.
Gangster Guru steals Sayajirao's 250-year-old gold shield, a family heirloom safeguarded for generations. An irked Sayajirao traces Guru in Goa where he is supposed to make the deal.

Madhyamvarg is a story about the fight of the middle class people against injustice and evils of society. The story revolves around a Police Inspector (Siddharth Jadhav) and a journalist (Ravi Kishan) and his family. The film marks the debut of Bhojpuri actor Ravi Kishan in the Marathi Film Industry.
Anirudh, a 12th standard student, juggles between day-to-day pressure, entrance tests, hostel fun, and friends.
Due to poverty, Zelya is forced to leave his studies to support his family. Things take a turn for the worse when he gets injured and his father refuses to take him to the doctor.
Despite the political tensions, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj agrees to visit Agra per the Treaty of Purandhar. He aims to leave his mark on politics, understanding its future impact.
The story drives through the village and it's problems where the people started revolution against the situations
Simple Lovestory of kisu who is poor and sudha who belongs to rich family which comes to an end after long period.
Guru, a fraudster, becomes a witness to a murder, which is a part of a larger conspiracy. However, when his family and loved ones get threatened, he fights to protect them against all odds.
When the authorities plan to shut a school in a village after it fails to meet the prerequisites, a teacher, who shares a good rapport with his students, fights to educate more children
Chintoo, a sweet but naughty boy, is always up to mischief. Once, he and his friends decide to go on a quest to find hidden treasure while coming across many unfavourable characters along the way.

The film is based on a true incident. Mary (Stacy Bee) visits India looking for a surrogate mother. She finds Yashoda (Urmila Kanetkar), a farmer to bear her child, but gets disappointed on learning about the child's deformity. Mary decides to quit through this and leaves India. Few years later, Mary loses her patience and decided to come back and look for her child.

The center character is a potter “Savlya” who goes to haven and meets lord “indra” and after returning to earth he takes challenge to build  a 7 storey  building in one night and his donkey will marry kings  daughter and this is being done by “Savlya” because of will of donkey.
A family faces lot of hardships living in poverty one day a dog arrives in the house which proves lucky for them as he is a sent by god.
Yuvraj works for a renowned politician, Prabhakar, but he falls in love with his daughter, Rani. However, a brewing political conspiracy changes the course of their lives.

Dr Tatya Lahane's both kidneys were spoiled at the young age.His mother Anjanbai then donated one of her kidney to save his life.As an ophthalmologist he arranged many cataract camps nationwide and also in JJ Hospital. In 2007 he did his 100,000th cataract surgery in JJ Hospital.

A naive young medical student Sharvari is given a challenge from her friend circle to go to the morgue and tie the friendship band to dead bodies. However, things go awry when Sharvari is found dead under mysterious circumstances.

'Dagadabaichi Chaal’ is a crisp comedy starring Bollywood actor and comedian Rajpal Yadav debuting in a Marathi film for the first time. A simple take on Mumbai’s chaal lifestyle, its problems and true happiness – you won’t mind watching this one unless moral stories really bug you.

Here's a family of three Balu, his mother, and grandmother. They survive on his grandfather's pension of rupees eight hundred a month. Once Balu starts going to school, the expenses increase and unfortunately, the grandmother falls ill. Find out how this family struggles to survive against all odds.
When Samrat's mother falls into a coma, a spiritual guru advises him to give up his materialistic possessions and beg for alms for his mother's well-being.
Makarand and his capricious family members arrive in London but soon find themselves in the middle of a financial racket. Chased by Pakistani swindlers, they set out on a road trip.
Sameer Shroff, a big shot corporate young man marries an NRI's daughter, Neha. His life takes a sudden turn when his look-alike tries target Neha and his professional life.
After being abandoned by his lover, Satya finds himself entangled with alcohol and to overcome the grief his childhood lover and neighbour Shravani decides to marry him.

Once More is a Marathi movie about Kapil, an archaeologist, who's unhappily married to Anjali. When he finds a possibly magical dagger, he visits to Avadhpuri to find out more. Anjali is also visiting her grandfather who lives in Avadhpuri. When Kapil and Anjali are reunited in the town, strange things happen which are tied to a secretive, ancient past. What happens when this secret comes to light?

Kesari is a Marathi sports drama movie about Balram Jadhav, a young wrestler, whose only aim in life is to win The Maharashtra Kesari title! The film shows how Balram goes against his father's will who wants him to join his family business and how he continues to work towards his goal of winning the title. Watch Kesari to see if Balram will be successful in achieving his goals against all the odds.
Conditions Apply explores new age relationships and how everything is more about acceptance today rather than compromise. But is that all it takes to make a relationship work?
Campus Katta is a film about college and youngsters as they fight corruption in their for-profit university.
A young man's passion for music lands him in trouble when his ideology begins to conflict with the political party leader who hired him.
Phuntroo is the tale of an engineering student who when spurned by his love, decides to build a better version of her with artificial intelligence.
Unable to conceive a child, a married couple turns to surrogacy but find themselves in a strange situation.
In a bid to woo Kiran, a popular radio jockey, Siddharth offers her to be a part of his company's radio campaign but unexpected situations affect the fate of their budding relationship.
A journey of a man who sets out to fulfil his father's last wish in this light-hearted drama that subtly underlines the importance of a father-son's relationship.
In search of her childhood friend, Gauri reaches a small town and seeks help from an undisciplined guy, Ambya, who's in love with her. Will the two find her friend? Find out now!
With Rajiv's life on the line, his friend Ajay decides to help him by collecting a large sum of money in order to save his life before mending his failed marriage with Janhvi.

Vishvanath (Sandeep Kulkarni) and Sudha's (Aditi Deshpande) lives take an ugly turn when they lose their only son in a train bombing. Sudha has a nervous breakdown and Vishvanath takes it upon himself to help his wife.
The story is based on the life of Shilpa belonging to the Paatharvat community. Shilpa’s family makes a living by selling stone grinders and toys.
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTYxZDJiMDktNGYyYi00ZTkxLTg2OTktMzdhNmVhYjI2NDljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTgwMjgwMjM@._V1_FMjpg_UX1000_.jpg
Movie.Movieimg: Shri returns from abroad and gets married to Smita who wins a huge amount of money in a lottery. Consequently, their family members get jealous and demand their share.

Movie.Description: Rangrao is all set to become Goa`s Chief Minister despite his links with terrorists. But one of his men (Bharat Jadhav) has a change of heart and makes the dangerous choice to work against him.
‘Chahto Mi Tula’ is a love story of young lovers offered by Kavisha Productions through their new film ‘Chahato Mee Tula’, which is all set to release on 15th January 2016.

Gavthi is a Marathi romantic movie about a young village boy Gajanan (Shrikant Patil) - his rags to riches story and all the struggles he lives through. Success came with enormous sacrifices for Gajanan, who gave up everything, including his childhood love, to make it big in the city! Watch Gavthi to know how Gajanan became successful & whether he actually got over his childhood love!
